text:
e="preserve">Dimitar Simeonov Largov (; 10 September 1936 – 26 November 2020) was a Bulgarian football midfielder. He played for Bulgaria in the 1966 FIFA World Cup. He also played for Septemvri Sofia and Slavia Sofia.
He also competed in the men's tournament at the 1960 Summer Olympics.
Largov died on 26 November 2020 at the age of 84.
